alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 11:59AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 8000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, Flat Tops and Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...Through 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
